00027         class 
00028         PagingLandScapeTileInfo
00029         {
00030                 public:
00031                         PagingLandScapeTileInfo(const uint pageX, const uint pageZ, 
00032                                           const uint tileX, const uint tileZ)
00033                                   :
00034                           mMinLevelDistSqr(0),
00035                                   mPageX (pageX),
00036                                   mPageZ (pageZ),
00037                                   mTileX (tileX),
00038                                   mTileZ (tileZ)
00039                           {
00040                           }
00041                    ~PagingLandScapeTileInfo()
00042                    {
00043                                 delete mMinLevelDistSqr;
00044                    }
00045 
00046                         //This is the Page Index in the Page Array
00047                         unsigned short int mPageX;
00048                         unsigned short int mPageZ;
00049                         
00050                         //This is the tile Index in the Tile Array
00051                         unsigned short int mTileX;
00052                         unsigned short int mTileZ;
00053 
00055                         // costly to compute, so we cache it there.
00056                         std::vector<Real>* mMinLevelDistSqr;
00057         };
